segments.text: I'm watching this kitchen, and something feels off right away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's at the sink, focused on her plate drying task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water's running over, flooding the basin and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea, standing right in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if she slips? That could be dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then the boy on the stoolâ€”it's tilting backward precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching so high into the cookie jar, one wrong move and down he goes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below is encouraging him, arm up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They could both get hurt in this wet, slippery spot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame the whole risky climb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the garden's calm, but inside it's tense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before an accident happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes could crash if things go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This unobserved chaos is making my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful outside view only heightens the worry.
segments.speaker: PAR
